edu.bonn.cs.wmp.views
Interface WMPView

All Known Implementing Classes:
WMPEditText
public interface WMPView

This interface has to be implemented by all WMPViews. The implementing class needs to have access to some kind of data structure to store all WMPAwarenessWidgets it manages. Normally an ArrayList is more than sufficient.

Author:
Sven Bendel

Method Summary
 void addWidget(WMPAwarenessWidget w)
          Adds the given widget to the list of widgets being informed by this view about ContentChanges.
 void notifyCollaboratorsOfContentChange(ContentChange c)
          This method is the link to the other collaborators.
 void notifyExternalWMPWidgetsOfContentChange(ContentChange c)
          This method notifies all Awareness Widgets who have registered themselves at this View of new ContentChanges.
 boolean removeWidget(WMPAwarenessWidget w)
          Adds the given widget to the list of widgets being informed by this view about ContentChanges.

Adds the given widget to the list of widgets being informed by this view about ContentChanges.

removeWidget

boolean removeWidget(WMPAwarenessWidget w)
Adds the given widget to the list of widgets being informed by this view about ContentChanges.

Parameters:
w - WMPAwarenessWidget

notifyExternalWMPWidgetsOfContentChange

void notifyExternalWMPWidgetsOfContentChange(ContentChange c)
This method notifies all Awareness Widgets who have registered themselves at this View of new ContentChanges.

Parameters:
c - ContentChange to be propagated to the Awareness Widgets

notifyCollaboratorsOfContentChange

void notifyCollaboratorsOfContentChange(ContentChange c)
This method is the link to the other collaborators. The method has to take care of propagating the ContentChange to the Awareness widgets of all session takers.

Parameters:
c - ContentChange to be propagated to the other session takers
